description: Puts or Deletes multiple key value pairs in a single, all-or-nothing operation.

parameters.name: KvsARN
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Key Value Store.

parameters.name: IfMatch
parameters.description: The current version (ETag) of the Key Value Store that you are updating keys of, which you can get using DescribeKeyValueStore.

parameters.name: Puts
parameters.description: List of key value pairs to put. (dict) --- List item for key value pair to put. The key of the key value pair list item to put. The value for the key value pair to put.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the key value pair list item to put.

nested_params.name: Value
nested_params.description: The value for the key value pair to put.

parameters.name: Deletes
parameters.description: List of keys to delete. (dict) --- List item for keys to delete. The key of the key value pair to be deleted.

nested_params.name: Key
nested_params.description: The key of the key value pair to be deleted.

nested_items.name: ItemCount
nested_items.description: Number of key value pairs in the Key Value Store after the successful update.

nested_items.name: TotalSizeInBytes
nested_items.description: Total size of the Key Value Store after the successful update, in bytes.

nested_items.name: ETag
nested_items.description: The current version identifier of the Key Value Store after the successful update.
